#summary Translating pidgin-musictracker into your langugage
#labels Featured

pidigin-musictracker now supports a translatable UI.

Additional translations are welcome. 

The file [http://code.google.com/p/pidgin-musictracker/source/browse/trunk#trunk/po po/musictracker.pot] is a template containing all the translatable messages.

You can create an empty translation file by copying and editing it or by using the [http://www.gnu.org/software/gettext/manual/gettext.html#Creating msginit] program provided by GNU gettext.

Add translated text for _msgid_ lines to the _msgstr_ lines.

Raise a new issue with your translation file attached
